title: What is this quest.
body:
"Feed a poro in a game where any poro explodes on the howling abyss." 

I don't understand what this is supposed to be. I fed a Poro on ARAM and Snowdown. Nothing happened.

replies.body: Urban legend suggests that feeding one poro brings all the poros.  It may require a team effort to fatten up a single poro just enough, not speaking from experience.  :)
